llm_res.rule: The ownerOf function must return the address of the owner of the NFT.

The transferFrom function must throw unless msg.sender is the current owner, an authorized operator, or the approved address for this NFT. It must also throw if from is not the current owner, if to is the zero address, or if tokenId is not a valid NFT.
The `name` function should return the name of the token.
The getApproved function must throw if tokenId is not a valid NFT.
allowance function should return the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
